import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import React from "react" import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import { Col, Modal, ModalBody, Row } from "reactstrap" const DeleteModal = ({ show, onDeleteClick, onCloseClick }) => { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); return (

{t("Are you sure?")}

{t("You won't be able to revert this!")}
) } DeleteModal.propTypes = { onCloseClick: PropTypes.func, onDeleteClick: PropTypes.func, show: PropTypes.any } export default DeleteModal
